name: West Bank Pub Ale
description: Most welcoming British pubs off a house ale or "pub ale" â this is ours. We use only the finest English barley, hops and yeast to create this classic English-style pale ale. It is noted for its nice malt flavor balanced with a medium hop presence. The pub ale is often referred to as our house "session beer" (a beer you can drink a number of and not fall off your barstool).
